metadata.title: CVE-2020-6444 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Uninitialized use in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 81.0.4044.92 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
